text: Kent State University is a public university in Kent, Ohio. The university has about 41,365 students. It was founded in 1910. The current president of the university is Beverly Warren. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Golden Flashes. They have 17 varsity teams and they compete in the Mid-American Conference. ==Other websites== *Kent State University's Official website *Kent State Golden Flashes' Official athletics website Category:Mid-American Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1910 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in Ohio
title: Kent State University
